alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 11:26PM CDT until April 01 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hardeman County in west Tennessee... McNairy County in west Tennessee... Chester County in west Tennessee... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Masseyville, or 9 miles south of Chickasaw State Forest, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Selmer, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Adamsville, Silerton, Masseyville, Jacks Creek, Robertson, McNairy, Bethel Springs, Middleton, Eastview, Toone, Hornsby, Finger, Stantonville, Milledgeville, Enville and Forty Forks. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west Tennessee.
